summary: Each follower has unique spells and body.
descriptionHtml:
[u][b]Oriental followers[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/83859-1-1494737332.jpg[/img]
[color=#ff0000]The first time you enter the game you may not find them. You just need to quit and then re-enter the game you can find them.[/color][/b][/u]
1.Lvy The Weapon Master
spells: Incinerate, Flame cloak, stoneflesh, Conjure Sword Soul etc...
perks: Light Foot, Fighting Stance, Unhindered, Silence, DualSavagery etc...
location: DragonsReach[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/83859-0-1494737332.jpg[/img]
2.Ludia The Berserker
spells: Healing, Lightning Cloak, Candlelight, Oakflesh, Lesser Ward, Conjure Beast soul, Conjure anger etc...
perks: Light Foot, Fighting Stance, Unhindered, Silence, DualSavagery etc...
location: Companion Training Spot or jorrvaskr living quarters
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/83859-3-1494737332.jpg[/img]
3.Carroll The Assassin
spells: Healing, Invisibility, Lightning Cloak, Close Wounds etc...
perks: Light Foot, Fighting Stance, Unhindered, Silence, DualSavagery, Assassin's Blade, Deadly Aim, Dual Savagery, Shadow Warrior etc...
location: Candle hearth Hall Windhelm
 [img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/83859-0-1494738389.jpg[/img]
4.Allen The Blademaster
spells: Healing, Invisibility, Lightning Cloak, Close Wounds etc... 
perks: Light Foot, Fighting Stance, Unhindered, Silence, DualSavagery, Dual Savagery etc...
location: DragonsReach
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/83859-4-1494737332.jpg[/img]
5.Alice The Ice Mage
spells: Healing, Frostbite, Frost Cloak, Candlelight, Summon Arniel's Shade, Icy Spear, Conjure Frost Atronach etc...
perks: Light Foot, Fighting Stance, Unhindered, Silence, DualSavagery etc...
location: The Bannered Mare
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/83859-5-1494737332.jpg[/img]
6.Wendy Willow The Survivor
spells: Incinerate, Flame cloak, stoneflesh, Wall of Flames, Firebolt, Flames, Conjure Abigail etc...
perks: Light Foot, Fighting Stance, Unhindered, Silence, DualSavagery, Augmented Flames2, Destruction Dual Casting, Impact  etc...
location: Candle hearth Hall Windhelm
 [img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/83859-0-1494738677.jpg[/img]
7.Una Evans The Summoner
spells: Healing, Lightning Cloak, Candlelight, Revenant, Conjure Wispmother, Conjure Magic Anomaly
perks: Light Foot, Fighting Stance, Unhindered, Silence, DualSavagery, Twin Souls etc...
location(Day): Whiterun
location(night): The Bannered Mare[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/83859-10-1494737331.jpg[/img]
author: Max Zhang
